'''Cool Isle''' is a realm layout in the [[Serenitea Pot]] system. It is one of the three realms available to choose from by default when the Serenitea Pot system is unlocked.

It comes with the [[Main Building/Mansion|Main Building]] [[Mondstadt Mansion: Windward Manor]].

==Description==
{{Description|An island cluster surrounded by water.<br />One wonders how many cups of tea can be brewed from this vast ocean.|Realm Layout Preview}}
